title.rendered: What’s New in Email Marketing? Lots!

content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” content_placement=”bottom” css=”.vc_custom_1513447784446{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 10% !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/single-resource-page-bg-colorol-1902×496.jpg) !important;background-position: center !important;background-repeat: no-repeat !important;background-size: cover !important;}”][vc_column width=”3/4″ offset=”vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-8 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1513447899715{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

What's New in Email Marketing? Lots!

Hear it all in the 2017 report
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/4″ offset=”vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-4 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs” css=”.vc_custom_1513447853604{margin-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1513447938524{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 20px !important;padding-bottom: 20px !important;padding-left: 20px !important;background-color: #3a3042 !important;border-radius: 5px !important;}”]

On-Demand Webinar
Air Date: Wed, Oct. 18, 2017
Duration: 1 hour

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1507570167359{padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1504895160519{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_row_inner css=”.vc_custom_1507577013722{margin-top: -24% !important;margin-bottom: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}” el_class=”sm-hide”][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156780″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1512699717512{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″][vc_single_image image=”156658″ add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center” style=”vc_box_border_circle_2″ css=”.vc_custom_1512699746012{margin-bottom: 0px !important;border-bottom-width: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Email marketing continues to dominate the digital marketing landscape in terms of performance. But what strategies are proving most effective for agencies and their clients?

To find out, SharpSpring and Ascend2 fielded the State of Email Marketing Survey in September 2017. This webinar revealed the results, analyzed what it all means for marketers, and provided useful tips and strategies to improve your email marketing results.

Check out this On-Demand webinar to find out:

  • The most important objectives of an email marketing strategy.
  • Which email marketing tactics are the most effective.
  • Top metrics for measuring email marketing performance.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1507570006488{margin-top: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text]

Watch it now

Do you work at a marketing agency?*
yesno

Sign up for a live demo of SharpSpring?*
YesNo

We’re committed to keeping your info safe. Privacy Policy


[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”100px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”sm-hide” width=”1/2″]
Your Hosts:
[vc_empty_space]

Todd Lebo

Partner/CMO, Ascend2

At Ascend2, Todd helped develop a research-based marketing methodology that is used by marketing technology firms and agencies to generate demand and supplement content. Prior to joining Ascend2, Todd led the MarketingSherpa marketing, content, research and business development teams.

Koertni Adams

Partner Enablement Manager, SharpSpring

Koertni came to SharpSpring from a partner agency. She has walked in your shoes pitching and using marketing automation. She now develops content, programs, events and other resources to help agency partners become even more proficient at growing revenues and serving clients.

[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content_no_spaces” css=”.vc_custom_1504794984035{padding-top: 0px !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

Ready to learn more?

Month-to-month options. No long-term contract required.

START HERE
[/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
